posts.description:
I've just uploaded a *bunch* of new phone case designs to my @casetify store! (Yes, I know heaps of you didn't know I even had a Casetify Store... I'm hopeless at remembering to share all the things) But, because I'm legit excited about these new designs I've decided to do a giveaway!!! To enter, all you have to do is tell me which one of these five you LOVE, and I'll choose one comment randomly and send you that cover for your phone! üì±
You can see the rest of the collection at liss.com.au/casetify - and I'm pretty sure there's a special running at the moment for Mother's Day so it's a great time to buy if you can't possibly wait to see if you win the giveaway! ‚ù§Ô∏è
Competition is open worldwide for the next 48 hours (until Thursday 9pm AEST / 7pm EST). I will contact the winner via DM and comment here within 24 hours of the comp closing. Prize is 1 phone case - in any of the phone models available on Casetify.

"Life is brutal. But it‚Äôs also beautiful. Brutiful, I call it. Life‚Äôs brutal and beautiful are woven together so tightly that they can‚Äôt be separated." @glennondoylemelton üíú
.
I am seeing this played out so much in my current season of life. So many hard and painful things. But so many beautiful and precious things too. All at once, in the very same moment, or thing that happened. Particularly painful week this week, but so grateful for the beauty amongst it all, grateful for the people who love me and see me. Grateful for all of you and the way we can share a little snippet of our lives through our phones (or whatever you're using to read this). Embrace the brutiful friends. Liss xx
Spent a few hours with the lovely @kitstercronk today updating the chalk wall at @bridgemanbaptist. We are definitely getting faster at this - did this one in half the time of the last one!

So I kinda decided my Brush Calligraphy workbook needed a funkier cover. #asyoudo #designerlife üòÇ Thanks to all who have bought it already! If you missed my earlier post, new product up on my site, 35 pages of downloadable goodness for you to practice your letters - print it on paper or import the images straight into Procreate for some iPad practice. I've also included my favourite Procreate brush for you. #winnerwinner. Shop at liss.com.au

Last year I made a font using a plugin for Illustrator that was very cool and simple to use, but the typography nerd in me didn't really cope with the fact I couldn't adjust the kerning properly and get it all "just right". And as much as I wanted to do it all properly, the idea of doing #allthethings to make a legit amazing font totally terrified me!!!!üòú
Now my friend Teela over at @everytuesday has just released an amazing online course that breaks down alllll the ins and outs of making a font, as well as selling it! I am super excited to work through the course myself, would love to have some of you join me.‚ù§Ô∏è
Her course is only open for enrolment for five days, so if this is something you've been thinking of doing, get onto it quick!! Link is in my profile üëâüèº @lissletters or go to bit.ly/fontmaking
.
.
.
(This is an affiliate link, which means I make money from any sale made from my link, but the price doesn't change for you. I would never recommend anything to you that I didn't wholeheartedly believe in)

This. You don't have to have it all together, no one every actually does anyway - we're all a bit messy and complicated if we're honest.üíú
I've spent most of this morning staring at my computer blankly and trying to decide whether to persist or just crawl back in bed. As a mum who works from home, quiet moments are rare, and the struggle to decide whether to be productive or just lie on the floor and breathe in the silence is real. And while we're being honest, I'll probably do a bit of both today. But I also want to use my child free time to have adult conversations with other women in my life. Anyone else out there trying to cram 20 hours of productivity, some self care and social interaction into 5 hours of child free time??? üòÑüíú

Shoutout to all the amazing women on #internationalwomensday üíú
So grateful for the ones who have gone before us, the ones who surround me in my life and for the two incredible ones I am raising. Tag the women who rock your world ‚ù§
(Words by @drrebeccaray, lettering by me)
It's not even Monday here anymore. ‚òïÔ∏èüòú
This print is available as a digital download over on my Patreon site - I would love for you to check it out and consider joining me there ‚ù§‚ù§ #linkinprofile üëâüèº @lissletters
